oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Andrew Miller interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ed Caudill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Col. Andrew Miller was a USAF navigator in a KC-135, in-country in late 1971 and in 1972. Many of his flights were dedicated to mid-air refueling of other aircraft. This interview was conducted Sept. 9, 2020 by Billy Minser and Ed Caudill.
